description:
Do you want to get a professional high-end retoucher?

… or want to enhance your own photos for having a professional photographer-portfolio?

Then this training is the right one for you!

Learn how to do a full high-end beauty retouch with professional techniques of the high-end beauty industry! Retouch skin smooth, but natural-looking and create a look for your image to make it stand out from the masses! Learn how to work non-destructive for achieving professional and best results!

Who should take this course and who should not?

This course is not recommended for people who are completely new in Photoshop, however you don't need experience with high-end retouching. It is created especially for beginners in high-end retouching and easy to follow - even if English is not your first language. However, it is recommended for everyone (beginner, advanced, pro) for learning new techniques, methods & approaches.

Content:
  1. Introduction
  2. Raw-Conversion incl. multiple Raw-Conversions
  3. General Workflow
  4. Basic retouch (healing, cloning, layer modes)
  5. Fine tuning (different types of Dodge & Burn, Frequency Seperation, Correcting skin tones, Make-up Correction)
  6. Selective sharpening and creating a look with adjustment layers
  7. Final touch-ups
BONUS Material:
  • PSD-file including all layers
  • RAW-file for practising purposes
  • Large set of Photoshop Actions
title: High End Beauty Retouch - For Beginners
